events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position, and their resume looks impressive with solid development experience.
The candidate's application has been categorized under Engineering due to their background as a software developer and experience with relevant technologies.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to the candidate to guide them through the interview process and address any inquiries.
The initial screening call was conducted successfully; the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software development principles and enthusiasm for the role.
The candidate promptly responded, expressing excitement to proceed to the technical interview and eagerness to contribute to the engineering team.
The technical interview has been successfully scheduled for the candidate with our senior engineers to assess their coding and problem-solving skills.
